mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(rt.purch_date, '%Y-%m') AS month, COALESCE(SUM(t.ticket_price), 0) AS totalsales FROM registered_ticket rt JOIN ticket t ON rt.ticket_no = t.ticket_no WHERE YEAR(rt.purch_date) = '2023' GROUP BY month ORDER BY month

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sd.year_month, '%Y-%m') AS `month`,COALESCE(SUM(t.ticket_price), 0) AS totalsales FROM standard_date sd LEFT JOIN registered_ticket rt ON date_format(rt.purch_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(sd.year_month,'%Y-%m') LEFT JOIN ticket t ON rt.ticket_no = t.ticket_no where YEAR(sd.year_month)=#{param1} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(sd.year_month, '%Y-%m')
